pages.text: haj ke mahine muqarrar hai, is liye jo shaqs in mein haj laazim karle, wo apni biwi se mel milap karne, gunah karne aur ladaayi jhagde karne se bachta rahe, tum jo neki karoge us se Allah ta’ala ba qabar hai, aur apne saath safar qarch le liya karo, sub se behtar tosha Allah ta’ala ka darr hai, aur aye aqal-mando mujh se darte raha karo

tum par apne rub ka fazl talaash karne mein koyi gunaah nahi, jab tum arfaath se lauto mash’are haraam ke paas zikr ilaahi karo aur us ka zikr karo jaise ke us ne tumhe hidaayath di, halaan ke tum is se pehle raah bhule hoye thein
phir tum us jagaah se lauto jis jagaah se sub log lauthte hai aur Allah ta’ala se talab baqshish karte raho, yaqinan Allah ta’ala baqshne waala meherbaan hai

phir jab tum arkaan haj ada kar chuko, to Allah ta’ala ka zikr karo jis tarah apne baap daado ka zikr kiya karte thein, balke us se bhi zyaada, baaz log wo bhi hai jo kehte hai aye hamaare rab hamein dunya mein de, aise logo ka aqirath mein koyi hissa nahi
aur baaz log wo bhi hai jo kehte hai aye hamaare rab! hamein dunya mein neki de aur aaqirath mein bhi bhalaayi ata farma aur hemein azaab jahannam se najaath de
ye wo log hai jin ke liye un ke amaal ka hissa hai aur Allah ta’ala jald hisaab lene waala hai
